title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Online Learning for Research-Based Community Public Health Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of public health concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose community health issues by analyzing public health data using mathematical methodologies.
Learners can design and implement self-directed research projects using an online research-based learning model.
Learners can visualize public health research findings and evaluate their statistical significance.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
